title: Work-related Sentences
description: Practice B1-entry sentences used in daily work situations.

steps.teacher: 我今天有三個重要的任務要完成。
expected_answer: 我今天有三個重要的任務要完成。
steps.pinyin: wǒ jīn tiān yǒu sān gè zhòng yào de rèn wù yào wán chéng.
steps.english_hint: I have three important tasks to finish today.

steps.teacher: 下午兩點我有一場會議，不能遲到。
expected_answer: 下午兩點我有一場會議，不能遲到。
steps.pinyin: xià wǔ liǎng diǎn wǒ yǒu yì chǎng huì yì, bù néng chí dào.
steps.english_hint: I have a meeting at 2 PM and cannot be late.

steps.teacher: 我需要向主管報告專案的最新進度。
expected_answer: 我需要向主管報告專案的最新進度。
steps.pinyin: wǒ xū yào xiàng zhǔ guǎn bào gào zhuān àn de zuì xīn jìn dù.
steps.english_hint: I need to report the latest project progress to my supervisor.

steps.teacher: 因為資料還沒整理好，我可能需要多一點時間。
expected_answer: 因為資料還沒整理好，我可能需要多一點時間。
steps.pinyin: yīn wèi zī liào hái méi zhěng lǐ hǎo, wǒ kě néng xū yào duō yì diǎn shí jiān.
steps.english_hint: Because the data is not ready, I may need more time.

steps.teacher: 如果你方便，可以幫我檢查一下嗎？
expected_answer: 如果你方便，可以幫我檢查一下嗎？
steps.pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ fāng biàn, kě yǐ bāng wǒ jiǎn chá yí xià ma?
steps.english_hint: If it's convenient, can you help me check it?

steps.teacher: 我今天有點忙，可能無法準時完成。
expected_answer: 我今天有點忙，可能無法準時完成。
steps.pinyin: wǒ jīn tiān yǒu diǎn máng, kě néng wú fǎ zhǔn shí wán chéng.
steps.english_hint: I'm a bit busy today, so I might not finish on time.

steps.teacher: 我們稍後再討論細節會比較好。
expected_answer: 我們稍後再討論細節會比較好。
steps.pinyin: wǒ men shāo hòu zài tǎo lùn xì jié huì bǐ jiào hǎo.
steps.english_hint: It might be better if we discuss the details later.

steps.teacher: 我會把文件整理好再寄給你。
expected_answer: 我會把文件整理好再寄給你。
steps.pinyin: wǒ huì bǎ wén jiàn zhěng lǐ hǎo zài jì gěi nǐ.
steps.english_hint: I will organize the documents before sending them to you.

steps.teacher: 雖然有點累，但我會盡量做完。
expected_answer: 雖然有點累，但我會盡量做完。
steps.pinyin: suī rán yǒu diǎn lèi, dàn wǒ huì jìn liàng zuò wán.
steps.english_hint: Although I'm tired, I will try my best to finish it.

steps.teacher: 如果有問題，我會再跟你說。
expected_answer: 如果有問題，我會再跟你說。
steps.pinyin: rú guǒ yǒu wèn tí, wǒ huì zài gēn nǐ shuō.
steps.english_hint: If there's any issue, I will let you know.
